source: 頭に来るよ　クララ
references: Makes me crazy! Clara!

source: 頭に来るとこだったぜ
references: I was about to get mad.
hypothesis: It was coming to my head

source: 頭に来る 見てもらえるか？
references: Give it a rap, will ya? See if you could get it going for me.
hypothesis: Can you see it coming to my head?

source: 建物をしらみつぶしだ 頭に来るが　やつら精鋭だよ
references: Hotel Company's still working this side of the river street by street and house by house.
hypothesis: I'm crushing the building, but they come to my head, but they're elite

source: この国の連中は頭に来る
references: You know what really pisses me off about these people?
hypothesis: The guys in this country come to mind

source: アンタの一言一言が頭に来るわね
references: Every other word you say is either hell or shit or damn.
hypothesis: Every word of you comes to my mind

source: 頭に来る質問を続けるなら そうすることなるぞ。
references: I will if you continue with your infernal questioning.
hypothesis: If you keep asking the questions that come to your mind, you'll do that.

source: 頭に来るぜ
references: This totally sucks.
